events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster, based on the skills and experience listed in your resume.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will be reaching out to you shortly to discuss the next steps in the hiring process.
We completed the initial screening and are impressed with your background and technical skills relevant to the software engineering role.
Thank you for responding promptly to our screening questions and confirming your availability for the technical interview next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 19th at 10:00 AM UTC with our senior developer team.
The technical interview was successfully completed, and the panel provided very positive feedback on your engineering skills and problem-solving approach.
We have arranged an HR interview to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and overall alignment with our company values next Wednesday.
